cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to 'invalid' (unknown enum) will cause security configuration failure and gNB initialization error.

du.explanation_en: Setting physCellId to -1 (negative value) will cause invalid physical cell ID configuration error and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 physCellId 設定為 -1（負值）會導致無效物理小區 ID 配置錯誤，並造成小區設定失敗。
